md5_file: In cryptography, MD5 (Message-Digest algorithm 5) is a widely used cryptographic hash function with a 128-bit hash value and has been employed in a wide variety of security applications. It is also commonly used to check the integrity of files and strings. This function will take the given file and generate a unique MD5 for that file which can then be stored for later use.
The file to generate the MD5 hash for.
The above code will generate an MD5 hash for the specified file and store the returned value in the variable "hash".
